title: Freefall
description: Lieutenant Brent Miller arrived in the Middle East with one objective―get seven hostages out of a hostile country. The plan almost worked. But now he has been left behind―with one of the hostages. It's up to Brent to get Amy Whitmore, an LDS Senator's daughter, across miles of desert to safety. What he doesn't know is that to survive, he needs her as much as she needs him.
author: Traci Hunter Abramson
